name: Aave Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by wrapped Aave tokens, which generate yield from lending activities on the Aave protocol, resulting in continuous appreciation of the pool's total value.

name: Morpho Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by wrapped Morpho vault tokens. Morpho Vaults generate yield from over-collateralized lending. Borrowers deposit collateral and borrow liquidity from the underlying markets, paying interest to the vault.

name: infiniFi Boosted
description: This boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by infiniFi & Ethena tokens. siUSD earns yield from fractional reserve deployments of capital into lending markets & illiquid, higher yielding assets like Pendle PTs & Ethena sUSDe. sUSDe earns yield from the tokenized strategy for farming funding rates as provided through Ethena Finance.

name: Extra Finance Boosted
description: This Boosted Pool is powered by wrapped Extrafi XLend tokens, which earn yield through lending activity on the Extrafi XLend protocol—driving continuous growth in the pool’s total value.

name: Resolv Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by staking USR to receive allocation of Resolv collateral pool profits. wstUSR is the non-rebasing version of staked USR, which accrues value over time from staking rewards.

name: Hyperbeat Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by Hyperbeat vault tokens, which generate yield from non-custodial smart contracts optimizing liquidity across the HyperEVM ecosystem by interacting with Hypercore and HyperEVM, offering higher base yields through greater capital flexibility.

name: Felix Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by Felix vault tokens, which generate yield from on-chain borrowing and lending products on Hyperliquid L1, including CDP markets for leveraged trading and vanilla markets for variable-rate lending pools.

name: Hyperdrive Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by Hyperdrive vault tokens, which generate yield from Hyperliquid's premier DeFi hub featuring lending, borrowing, liquid staking, leveraged HLP vaults, and one-click yield strategies.

name: Yearn Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by Yearn vault tokens, which generate yield from automated strategies that deploy assets across DeFi protocols. Yearn vaults aggregate user deposits and optimize yield through active position management, compounding rewards, and reallocating capital to the most efficient opportunities.

name: CAP Boosted
description: This boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by CAP. stcUSD is the yield-bearing stablecoin of Cap that enables users to earn rewards via a decentralized lending framework.

name: HyperLend Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by HyperLend vault tokens, which generate yield from a high-performance lending protocol built for capital efficiency, offering real-time leverage, dynamic rates, and deep liquidity access.

name: HypurrFi Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by HypurrFi vault tokens, which generate yield from a leveraged lending marketplace featuring clean leverage loops and the USDXL hybrid synthetic dollar backed by productive reserves of tokenized U.S. Treasuries.

name: Gearbox Boosted
description: This Boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by wrapped Gearbox tokens, which generate yield from lending activities on the Gearbox protocol, resulting in continuous appreciation of the pool's total value.
